Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 06 May 2019Only GE, Aviva, and AIA has disability income plans. I'm more familiar with the Aviva and AIA one. And both of them are fine, they only have different deferment periods, and slight difference in definitions. If you'd like a quote and a quick breakdown of the payout schedule for both of them, drop me a message. :)0 comments0
